    • Method Detail

      • investStocks

        void investStocks(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                  java.lang.Double fixedAmount,
                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> weights,
                  java.lang.String timeStamp,
                  java.lang.String commission)
           throws java.text.ParseException
        this method Invests a fixed amount into an existing portfolio containing multiple stocks, using a specified weight for each stock in the portfolio.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - portfolio name
        fixedAmount - fixed amount trying to invest.
        weights - the weights for each stocks in portfolio.
        timeStamp - the timestamp on which stocks are to be bought.
        commission - the commission fee.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if timestamp is invalid.

        fixedAmount - fixed amount trying to invest.
        timeStamp - the timestamp on which stocks are to be bought.
